formattedAddress: 63 Clinton St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 63 Clinton St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text: Celebrated our anniversary at this gem, and the experience was exceptional. The top-notch service and delightful caviar hand roll were highlights. The food, a perfect 10/10—impeccable balance and flavors. Despite comments on portion size, with 7 courses, they're just right, leaving room for dessert and an extra glass of wine. We're already planning our return!

text.text: Celebrated our anniversary at this gem, and the experience was exceptional. The top-notch service and delightful caviar hand roll were highlights. The food, a perfect 10/10—impeccable balance and flavors. Despite comments on portion size, with 7 courses, they're just right, leaving room for dessert and an extra glass of wine. We're already planning our return!

originalText.text: Absolutely my favorite restaurant in NYC! I’ve been here well over 8 times and every time is just as exciting, if not better than the last! Every dish is perfectly balanced between flavor and texture and the caviar hand rolls are to die for. Trust me when I say they don’t skimp on the caviar. The staff is friendly, accommodating, and knowledgeable. I work in wine and can honestly say the wine list is curated to perfection.

text.text: Absolutely my favorite restaurant in NYC! I’ve been here well over 8 times and every time is just as exciting, if not better than the last! originalText.text:
10/10 service. The two chefs themselves switch out and become servers which shows the emphasis this restaurant puts into service. We had a great time eating at the bar - a great date atmosphere.

The food was light and inventive. But giving this 4 stars because the portions were definitely on the small side, we wound up getting dollar pizza on the walk home. Lots to like here though and I could see myself returning.

originalText.text: Just perfect. Highly recommend Sixty Three Clinton for a special occasion - we came here for my birthday and the meal absolutely made my night. Everything on the menu was fabulous (especially loved the mackerel and apple sorbet, which had had the most beautiful texture) and everyone was so friendly and knowledgeable.  They even gave me a little card which was such a sweet gesture. Also 10/10 recommend getting the caviar hand roll as an add-on - so luxurious and just buttery divine goodness. We’ve dined out a lot this year and this place is definitely a standout. Will definitely be back, hopefully soon!

text.text: Just perfect. Highly recommend Sixty Three Clinton for a special occasion - we came here for my birthday and the meal absolutely made my night. We’ve dined out a lot this year and this place is definitely a standout. Will definitely be back, hopefully soon!

originalText.text: Amazing detail to service and exceptional focus on experience. Every person that stopped by at our table knew where we were in our courses, knew what we were each drinking, where our conversation left off with someone else, and the overall orchestration was seamless. Get the hand roll made special for you by the chef (earlier time slots in reservations). Don’t hesitate to engage in conversation, they are so knowledgeable and will share secrets—we got super secret recipe to brining our turkey before thanksgiving. It was amazing. What a gift!
